answers.author: Maxwell Moline
answers.text:
Teresa,
I've assembled a blog post that should help to answer your question:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/blogs/blogpost/1223/View_and_Review_Questions_for_Performance_Reviews
I hope this helps. Please let us know if we can be of any more help.
Thanks,
Max Moline
Knowledge Network Intern
ICMA

answers.author: Sandra Slappey
answers.text:
Hmmm - I read the question differently than Maxwell did.  I thought you were talking about outcome measures for admin functions - such as HR or Finance - rather than individual performance evals.  Can you clarify?
